AHx.caption: Upload file URL
AHx.doc: The URL from your backend upload workflow (Example: https://<plugin_name>.bubbleapps.io/<version>/api/<v>/wf/<upload_worflow>)
AHx.name: upload_url

AHy.caption: File name
AHy.doc: File name resulting of the action "Conjure PDF"
AHy.name: file_name

AHz.caption: Content
AHz.doc: Content resulting of the action "Conjure PDF"
AHz.name: file_data

AIA.caption: File input name
AIA.doc: The file field name (or key) in the backend upload workflow
AIA.name: file_input

AIB.caption: Authentication
AIB.doc: Token provided by an authentication workflow, it's necessary if the upload workflow need to be authenticated
AIB.name: token

AIC.caption: In order to upload the PDF file, you need to create a backend workflow that receive a file input! From this workflow return the file URL and other information that you want
AIC.name: upload_info

AOn.caption: Make this file private?
AOn.doc: Set "yes" if you want a private file
AOn.name: private

AOo.caption: Attach this file to
AOo.doc: If you want to make a private file, set the thing that the file will be attached
AOo.name: attach_to
